item.description:
We will be reading Who Killed Palomino Molero? by Mario Vargas Llosa.

Vargas Llosa takes his turn at writing detective fiction which also includes some of the recurring themes found in his other books: guilt and innocence, and despair at how difficult it is to be an honest man in a society based on the corruption both of motives and of feelings. At about 150 pages, it is an ideal read for this time of year.
item.name: Reading books by international writers May Meeting
